title: Leon Panetta on threats & resets: How a White House reacts to challenges, domestic and abroad
description: Leon Panetta, former Secretary of Defense and Director of the CIA during the Obama administration and  White House Chief of Staff to Bill Clinton, talks to Chuck Todd about “the shadow of the New Deal” and what Vladimir Putin really wants.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Leon Panetta, former Secretary of Defense and Director of the CIA during the Obama administration and  White House Chief of Staff to Bill Clinton, talks to Chuck Todd about “the shadow of the New Deal” and what Vladimir Putin really wants.
